name: Test06 - Verify Details Of Product Added To Cart
description: This test verifies the details of a product added to the cart

steps.name: business flow - sort products by price Lowest to Highest

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (a7b8a0963105eca515046832489c3f54)] -> css selector: select[name='orderby']]

parameters.name: productPrice
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (a7b8a0963105eca515046832489c3f54)] -> css selector: p[class='price']]

steps.name: business flow - choose quantity and add product to the cart

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (a7b8a0963105eca515046832489c3f54)] -> relative: {filters=[{kind=near, args=[{css selector=*[name='add-to-cart']}, 50]}], root={tag name=input}}]

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (a7b8a0963105eca515046832489c3f54)] -> relative: {filters=[{kind=near, args=[{css selector=*[name='add-to-cart']}, 50]}], root={tag name=input}}]

steps.name: business flow - get product subtotal price

parameters.name: rowElements
parameters.value: [[[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (a7b8a0963105eca515046832489c3f54)] -> css selector: td[class='product-name']], [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (a7b8a0963105eca515046832489c3f54)] -> css selector: td[class='product-price']], [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (a7b8a0963105eca515046832489c3f54)] -> css selector: input[type='number']], [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (a7b8a0963105eca515046832489c3f54)] -> css selector: td[class='product-subtotal']]]
